conversations.content: What's a good summary of my 100 most recent transactions this year in terms of categories and amounts?

(function_thought)
To provide a summary of the user's 100 most recent transactions this year, I need to first gather the user information and then retrieve the most recent transactions. This approach will help establish a baseline for analyzing the transactions. The next step is to invoke the first function in the previously initialized trajectory: get_user_info.
</function_thought>

(function_call)
[get_user_info()]
</function_call>
